EV001: 『…これは、私が貴方を巻き込んでしまった運命の物語。』\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\^\^\^
column2: "This is a fateful story that I ended dragging you in."\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\^\^\^
"A record of our story...\.\.\.\. As we fought our fate..."\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\^\^\^\^\^\^

EV001:
『その全てがいいことばかりじゃなかったと思うけど、\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.
　それでも私にとってはとても楽しくて、思い出深い冒険。』\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\^\^\^\^\^\^\^\^\^\^
column2:
"Even while it involved struggles and hard times...\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.
 For me it was a fun adventure...\.\.\.\. That I'll never
 forget..."\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\^\^\^\^\^\^\^\^\^\^

"That is why... I want you to also learn it...\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.
 The you from a world different from mine..."\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\^\^\^\^\^\^

"There's no need to think hard about it right now...\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.
 But please...\.\.\.\.\.\. Remember the path you walk with me..."\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\^\^\^\^\^\^

EV001: ぐっすりと眠っている自分の隣から声が聞こえる
column2: You heard someone's voice in your sleep.

EV001: その声に眠りを妨げられ、徐々に意識が覚醒していく
column2:
The voice disturbed your sleep and gradually woke you
from your slumber.
